entry.title: H-N-S-Abayawardhana/File-Upload-API-using-Node.js-Express.js-and-Multer: A simple and lightweight RESTful API built with Node.js and Express.js that allows users to upload any type of file (images, documents, videos, etc.) to a local server. Multer is used for handling multipart/form-data and storing files in a designated directory. The API returns preview or download URLs for uploaded files.
entry.content: A simple and lightweight RESTful API built with Node.js and Express.js that allows users to upload any type of file (images, documents, videos, etc.) to a local server. Multer is used for handling multipart/form-data and storing files in a designated directory. The API returns preview or download URLs for uploaded files.
